lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Commission sources said it appeared the two countries were holding out in a bid to squeeze some form of compensation out of their partners but it was unclear how much longer they would continue to block the scheme.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A 3.6 billion dlr plan to rid the European Community (EC) of one mln tonnes of surplus butter is in doubt as Spain and Portugal refuse to drop their opposition to the scheme, diplomats said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The plan, proposed by the Community's executive Commission, aims to level most of the EC's huge and costly butter mountain by disposing of a total of 1.04 mln tonnes this year and next.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Commission sources said it appeared the two countries were holding out in a bid to squeeze some form of compensation out of their partners but it was unclear how much longer they would continue to block the scheme.

lst.name: sentence
